Class BankingService

java.lang.Object
com.stag.identity.person.service.BankingService
@Service public class BankingService extends Object

Banking Service

Business logic for person banking operations. Handles retrieval of banking information with localized bank names, and updates to bank accounts with validation of Czech account numbers and automatic IBAN generation.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček

  • Method Details

    • getPersonBanking

      @Cacheable(value="person-banking", key="{#personId, #language}") @PreAuthorize(" hasAnyRole('AD', 'DE', 'PR', 'SR', 'SP', 'VY', 'VK')\n || (principal.isStudent() && @authorizationService.isStudentOwner(principal.studentId, #personId))\n") public Banking getPersonBanking(Integer personId, String language)
      Retrieves person's banking information with localized bank names. Fetches banking projection then loads codelist data for bank codes and account types.
      Parameters:
      personId - the person identifier
      language - the language code for codelist localization
      Returns:
      banking information with localized data
      Throws:
      PersonNotFoundException - if person not found

    • updatePersonBankAccount

      public void updatePersonBankAccount(Person person, PersonUpdateCommand.BankAccount bankAccount)
      Updates person bank account information with validation and IBAN generation. Validates Czech account number checksums, enforces required field combinations, and automatically generates IBAN for Czech accounts. Allows clearing an account by providing all null values.
      Parameters:
      person - the person entity to update
      bankAccount - the new bank account data
      Throws:
      InvalidBankAccountException - if an account combination is invalid
